alert.note: Alert for Adams; Ringgold; Taylor; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 4:52PM CDT until April 04 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Union County in south central Iowa... Southeastern Adams County in southwestern Iowa... Northwestern Ringgold County in south central Iowa... Taylor County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 452 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hopkins, or 6 miles southwest of Bedford, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bedford Municipal Airport around 455 PM CDT. Bedford around 500 PM CDT. Gravity, Conway and Lake Of Three Fires State Park around 505 PM CDT. Sharpsburg around 510 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Clearfield, Lenox, Kent, Cromwell, Arispe, Shannon City and Creston Municipal Airport. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Iowa.
